channel.title: Monsters attacking players?
channel.description: I almost have my fight caves mini game ready. I have all the npc's to spawn after one dies, but the problem is. The NPC's wont auto attack the player, and they aren't even agressive. They hit maybe a 1 every now and then, other then that it's rapid 0's. I'm more worried about the npc's even attack the players. If you could help that would be appreciated.

item.title: Monsters attacking players?
item.dc:creator: @Zombiedevice Zombiedevice
item.description:
@Zombiedevice wrote:

K. I didn’t know by the TUT name “aggressive.” They should call it something else lol.

Read full topic
